def process_text(text):
    
    # Remove digits
    text = re.sub(r'\d+', ' ', text)
    
    # Split on whitespace
    text = text.split()
    
    # Join on whitespace, but only the words that are not stop words
    text = ' '.join([word for word in text if word not in stopwords.words('english')])
    
    return text
